name: Stickman Arena
description:
How do you think about the stickman fighting game? If you have never played a Stickman Fighting Game, you will not be able to ignore this new game. Stickman warriors fight is an anticipated new game mode in stickman games. This game is a combination of a survival game and fighting boss.
In this game, you’re a stickman hero and you have to overcome all dangerous obstacles to become the only winner and save your castle. Stickman Arena is very easy to play, but you have to be careful about another stickman who is trying to kill you. You have to collect your own team and weapons to make you stronger, defeat bosses and other players, and become king.
Stickman Arena is an extreme stickman warrior fighting tournament where supreme stickman games lovers can enjoy the unlimited thrill of stickman war in a highly dangerous fighting battle environment. Moreover, this fighting game is totally free, easy to control, and has the newest weapon that you have never seen.
